title: JJ Cale - Special Edition (1984)@flac
description:
Sinuous rhythms, conversational singing, and, most of all, intricate, bluesy guitar playing characterize Cale's performances of his own songs. 
This compilation, covering 11 years of recording, includes the songs Eric Clapton, who borrowed heavily from Cale's style in his 1970s solo work, made famous: "After Midnight" and "Cocaine." (AMG)

 <a href="
http://i.imgur.com/J9bQkyR.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://i.imgur.com/J9bQkyR.jpg</a>


01. Cocaine    [2:52]
02. Don't Wait    [3:09]
03. Magnolia    [3:24]
04. Devil In Disguise    [2:03]
05. Sensitive Kind    [3:38]
06. Carry On    [2:20]
07. After Midnight    [2:24]
08. Money Talks    [4:17]
09. Call Me The Breeze    [2:36]
10. Lies    [2:49]
11. City Girls    [2:50]
12. Cajun Moon    [2:15]
13. Don't Cry Sister    [2:13]
14. Crazy Mama    [2:23]



"Cocaine" is from the LP "Troubadour" and was recorded on September 9, 1975 at Columbia & Crazy Mammas Studios, Nashville, TN.
"Don't Wait" is from the LP "Grasshoppers" and was recorded on January 19, 1980 at Columbia Studios, Nashville, TN.
"Magnolia" is from the LP "Naturally" and was recorded on October 4, 1970 at Bradley's Barn, Mt. Juliet TN.
"Devil In Disguise" is from the LP "Grasshopper" and was recorded February, 1981 at North Hollywood, CA.
"Sensitive Kind" is from the LP "5" and was recorded on September 14, 1977 at Crazy Mammas Studios, Nashville, TN.
"Carry On" is from the LP "Shades" and was recorded September 26, 1980 at Capitol Studios Hollywood, CA.
"After Midnight" is from the LP "Naturally" and was recorded June 25, 1971 at Bradley's Barn, Mt. Juliet TN.
"Money Talks" is from the LP "8" and was recorded February 15, 1983 at Warner Brothers - North Hollywood (Digital).
"Call Me The Breeze" is from the LP "Naturally" and was recorded on September 29 at Moss Rose Studio and mixed at Bradley's Barn.
"Lies" is from the LP "Really" and was recorded on April 8, 1972 at Muscle Shoals Sound, Muscle Shoals, ALA.
"City Girls" is from the LP "Grasshopper" and was recorded on January 17, 1980 at Columbia Sudios, Nashville, TN.
"Cajun Moon" is from the LP "Okie" and was recorded on November 20, 1973 at Bradley's Barn, Mt. Juliet TN.
"Don't Cry Sister" is from the LP "5" and was recorded and mixed in July, 1979, at the Lakehouse - Old Hickory, TN.
"Crazy Mama" is from the LP "Naturally", and was recorded on September 29, 1970 at Moss Rose Studio, Nashville, TN. 



Written-By - Christine Lakeland (tracks: 2, 8), J.J. Cale 
Producer - Audie Ashworth, J.J. Cale 
Liner Notes ["Oor" Magazine] - Herman Van Der Horst 


Label: Mercury
Released: 1984 
Catalogue: 818 633-2
